posts.title: Riverstone
posts.subTitle: A mesh network of environment sensors.
posts.postDetails: Riverstone is an initiative to begin monitoring and collecting data on temperature, toxicity, and air quality using a low energy localized mesh network.

posts.title: Uppakoma
posts.subTitle: A localized events platform.
posts.postDetails: Uppakoma is a group initiative with ΛERIF°RM to build out a global events app with a focus on the spontaneous, prioritising events happening right now

posts.title: Hydra
posts.subTitle: An IoT cloud platform.
posts.postDetails: Collects data from remote sensors, automation tools and other systems by leveraging Microsoft’s secure Azure cloud platform.

posts.title: Vitae
posts.subTitle: A dashboard for showing strength gains over time.
posts.postDetails: Over the past two seasons, I have been taking daily notes on my exercise progress. I'm converting these notes into an Angular dashboard with a CRUD WebApp for data entry.

posts.title: Codex
posts.subTitle: A collection of knowledge.
posts.postDetails: Codex is my public Wiki. In it I take programming notes, jot down relevant links, add bits of philosophy, and recipes as well.

posts.title: Banxre
posts.subTitle: A port of JSONServer for source controlled rapid prototyping of applications.
posts.postDetails: Multiple database files compile into a single JSON file runtime which allows you to use JSON server for large, complex data sets.

posts.title: Tome
posts.subTitle: TOME is a file extension for the markup language Runic implemented in the hash/array database Indental.
posts.postDetails: TOME is a file extension for Neauoire's markup language Runic. Elements from hash/array database Indental have been added as well. TOME can be used for serverless applications to store local databases within JavaScript. The syntax highlighter for SublimeText3 included in this folder (tome.sublime-syntax) establishes visual heirarchy by identifying top level items and Runic characters.

posts.title: Sifr
posts.subTitle: A windows forms application to encrypt and decrypt lines of text.
posts.postDetails: The purpose of this application is to get an understanding of fundamental principles of encryption, specifically in Microsoft Technologies.
